extension.description: The essential toolkit for Google Antigravity IDE users. Monitor quotas, manage caches, and visualize system metrics.
viewsContainers.tfa-sidebar.title: Antigravity
views.tfa.sidebar.name: Toolkit
command.openPanel.title: Open Panel
command.showCacheSize.title: Show Cache Size
command.cleanCache.title: Clean Cache
command.refreshQuota.title: Refresh Quota
command.openSettings.title: Open Settings
command.showDisclaimer.title: About
command.restartLanguageServer.title: Restart Agent Service
command.restartUserStatusUpdater.title: Reset Status
command.runDiagnostics.title: Connectivity Diagnostics
command.toggleAutoAccept.title: Toggle Agent Auto-Accept
config.quotaDisplayStyle.classic-donut: Classic Donut: Traditional full circular ring
config.visualizationMode.groups: Group models by category (Gemini, Claude, GPT, etc.)
config.dashboard.gaugeStyle.description: Choose the visual style for quota display in the sidebar
config.dashboard.viewMode.description: Choose between grouped or individual model display in sidebar
config.dashboard.showUserInfoCard.descri: Show the user profile card (Avatar, Tier, Plan) in the sidebar
config.dashboard.showCreditsCard.descrip: Show the AI Credits usage card (Tokens, Flow) in the sidebar
config.dashboard.historyRange.descriptio: Time range for usage timeline chart in minutes (default: 90 minutes)
Show GPT quota in sidebar (GPT shares quota pool with Claude)
config.status.showQuota.description: Show quota information in the status bar
config.status.showCache.description: Display Antigravity IDE cache size in the status bar
config.status.displayFormat.description: Choose how to display quota information in status bar
config.status.warningThreshold.descripti: Show warning color when quota falls below this percentage
config.status.criticalThreshold.descript: Show critical color when quota falls below this percentage
config.status.scope.description: Choose which quota models to display in status bar
config.status.scope.primary: Current Model (Primary): Show only the active model's quota
config.status.scope.all: All Models: Show quotas for all available model groups
config.cache.autoClean.description: ⚠️ Automatically clean oldest tasks from Brain when cache size exceeds warning threshold (Note: This will delete physical files)
config.cache.autoCleanKeepCount.descript: Number of newest tasks to keep during automatic cleaning (default: 5)
config.cache.scanInterval.description: Cache check interval in seconds (minimum: 30s, default: 120s)
config.cache.warningSize.description: Show warning when cache size exceeds this value in MB
config.cache.hideEmptyFolders.descriptio: Hide empty folders in Brain and Code Tracker tree views
config.system.serverHost.description: ⚠️ Advanced: Custom server hostname for quota metrics. Default: 127.0.0.1
config.system.apiPath.description: ⚠️ Advanced: Custom API endpoint for quota metrics
config.system.debugMode.description: Enable debug logging and advanced connection diagnostics.
config.system.autoAccept.description: Automatically accept AI agent commands and file edits. (Hands-free Mode)
config.system.autoAcceptInterval.descrip: Interval for checking auto-accept in milliseconds (default: 800ms). Lower values are faster but consume more resources.
Hands-free Mode: Automatically accept ag: Hands-free Mode: Automatically accept agent suggested edits and terminal commands
command.setAnthropicApiKey.title: Set LLM API Key
config.commitMessageClaude.endpoint.desc: LLM API endpoint URL. Default: Ollama at localhost:11434. Also supports OpenAI-compatible and Anthropic APIs.
config.commitMessageClaude.model.descrip: Model name to use (e.g., llama3.2,  mistral, codellama)
Maximum characters of diff to send to the LLM
